item.title: I need help with vengeance
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I use an allstarscape source and I want to remove vengeance from my server for a little bit and possibly add it back later. Now, I want to just leave it in my client class. I don’t want to take it out and save it to my computer in a different file. How can I make it so it’s still in there, but it doesn’t work. Like I disable it or something? Here it is:

[code] case 162: {
if (actionTimer == 0) { {
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {}
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 15, 1);
setAnimation(2890);
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance pl0x!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}

            sendMessage("You use vengeance!");
            break;[/code]

I was thinking maybe adding ‘= false;’ somewhere in there but I don’t know.

Read full topic
